entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -31.5°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
